text: (ai rasool un logon se) kah do ki jo jibareel ka dushaman hai (usaka khuda dushaman hai) kyonki us farishte ne khuda ke hukm se (is kuraan ko) tumhaare dil par daala hai aur vah un kitaabon kee bhee tasadeek karata hai jo (pahale naazil ho chukee hain aur sab) usake saamane maujood hain aur eemaanadaaron ke vaaste khushakhabaree hai
